abstract: Alcoa, Bank of America and Hewlett-Packard — three stalwarts of corporate America that have fallen out of favor lately with investors — will be removed from the Dow Jones industrial average, to be replaced by Goldman Sachs, Visa and Nike.
snippet: Alcoa, Bank of America and Hewlett-Packard — three stalwarts of corporate America that have fallen out of favor lately with investors — will be removed from the Dow Jones industrial average, to be replaced by Goldman Sachs, Visa and Nike.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average is shaking up its roster.

headline.main: Dow Index Drops Bank of America, Alcoa and H.P.
headline.print_headline: Dow Index Replaces 3 of Its 30 Stocks
